description: Lovely 2BR/1.5 bath house with a newly renovated kitchen, parking spot and large backyard available to rent for the month of February.  6 blocks to the D/N express trains (20 minutes to Manhattan) and 5 blocks to the R, and only steps to Industry City. Sunset Park/Greenwood heights has a ton of amazing restaurants, bars, and historic Greenwood Cemetery--two blocks away.  $2979 for the month, plus utilities.  One-week rentals also available.
name: Two- story, 2 BR House w/parking, yard
